page.title: 07LOCAL NEWS
page.content: THE BORDERS REGIONAL COUNCIL IS TRYING TO CLOSE ALL THE ONE-TEACHER SCHOOLS. THE LOCAL COMMUNITY COUNCIL AND THE PARENTS HAVE PUT UP A STRONG FIGHT TO KEEP WHITSOME SCHOOL OPEN. THEY HAVE HAD MEETINGS WITH THE REGIONAL COUNCIL. WE HAVE JUST HEARD THAT THE SCHOOL IS TO REMAIN OPEN FOR THREE YEARS TO ALLOW SWINTON SCHOOL (THE SCHOOL THAT WE MIGHT BE GOING TO IF WHITSOME CLOSES) TO BE MODERNISED. THE LOCAL PEOPLE FEEL THE VILLAGE WOULD LOSE ITS COMMUNITY SPIRIT IF THE SCHOOL WERE TO CLOSE, SO THEY WOULD BE VERY PLEASED IF IT STAYS OPEN.
